articles.content:
Indian tea sellers adopt unique ways to sell the beverage. It is their unique style that leaves an impression on the people.
A video, posted recently on Instagram, shows foreigners are also impresse… [+868 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Amazon issued 13,000 disciplinary notices at single US warehouse
articles.description: In a single year ending April 2020, the company issued more than 13,000 so-called “disciplines” in Gerald Bryson’s warehouse alone, one lawyer for Amazon said in court papers. The facility had about 5,300 employees around that time.
articles.content:
Amazon worker Gerald Bryson had hand-counted thousands of items in his warehouse's inventory over three days when his manager showed him a "Supportive Feedback Document."
Bryson had made 22 errors, … [+8853 chars]
